item.title: Dimensions - Scoopi Web Scraper - why just scrape when you can scoop
item.description: DataDef Dimensions The previous quickstart example scrapes stock price data from the page and associates it with the item named price. However, we are also interested to know on what date the price was scraped. The dims allows Scoopi to add multiple dimensions to scraped data. In this chapter, we go through Example 1 job.xml to explain dimensions. The example adds date dimension to scraped price data. Dimensions The datadefs snippet from defs/examples/fin/jsoup/ex-1/job.
